definition: ASEAN/abbr. for 東南亞國家聯盟|东南亚国家联盟[Dong1 nan2 ya4 Guo2 jia1 Lian2 meng2]
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: They will become the "torch carriers" for China-ASEAN friendship.
sentences.chinese: 他们将成为中国和东盟友谊薪火相传的光明使者。

sentences.english: China-ASEAN relations have withstood the test of crises and disasters.
sentences.chinese: 中国和东盟的关系经受住了风雨灾祸的考验。

sentences.english: ASEAN community construction and East Asia cooperation move forward.
sentences.chinese: 东盟共同体建设和东亚合作向前推进。

sentences.english: China and ASEAN countries keep unimpeded communication on relevant issue.
sentences.chinese: 中国与东盟各国就有关问题保持着顺畅的沟通。

sentences.english: Philippines Senator Aquilino Pimentel says ASEAN countries also are in a position to help.
sentences.chinese: 菲律宾参议员皮门特尔说，东盟国家也可以提供帮助。

sentences.english: ASEAN congratulates China on successfully hosting the World Expo.
sentences.chinese: 东盟祝贺中国成功举办上海世博会。

sentences.english: The leaders of ASEAN, China, Japan and Korea issued the Kuala Lumpur Declaration.
sentences.chinese: 东盟和中日韩领导人在会上发表了《吉隆坡宣言》。

sentences.english: Surin appreciated and looked forward to China enhancing support and help for the ASEAN Secretariat.
sentences.chinese: 素林感谢并期待中方加强对东盟秘书处的支持和帮助。

sentences.english: With 560m people, the ASEAN trade bloc also offers a big population.
sentences.chinese: 拥有五亿六千万人口的东盟贸易区也存在大量消费者。

sentences.english: ASEAN is scheduled for March 22 to discuss the Thai-Cambodian border dispute.
sentences.chinese: 东盟定于本月22日讨论泰柬边界争端。

sentences.english: He noted that Thailand will make efforts to push forward the economic and trade cooperation between the ASEAN and China.
sentences.chinese: 泰方将努力推动东盟与中方在经贸等领域的合作。

sentences.english: ASEAN countries have been important locations of FDI from Japan in Asia-Pacific region.
sentences.chinese: 日本与东盟国家有着历史的和现实的密切关系。

sentences.english: There is also a question of whether others will recognize the emerging ASEAN.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还存在其它国家是否承认新兴的东盟这一问题。

sentences.english: ASEAN, however, seems a compelling advertisement for regionalism.
sentences.chinese: 然而，东盟看上去是地方主义的有力宣传。

sentences.english: Facts show that China is ASEAN’s trustworthy neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，中国是东盟值得信赖的好邻居。

sentences.english: Profound changes have taken place in both China and ASEAN countries.
sentences.chinese: 中国和东盟国家都发生了沧海巨变。

pinyin: Dong1 nan2 ya4 Guo2 jia1 Lian2 meng2

definition: abbr. for 東南亞國協|东南亚国协[Dong1 nan2 ya4 Guo2 Xie2]
Belt and Road Initiative, Chinese government plan to provide finance and engineering expertise to build infrastructure across Eurasia and northeast Africa, unveiled in 2013
Greater Mekong Subregion (GMS), area of economic cooperation between China and Vietnam
pinyin: Da4 Mei2 gong1 he2 ci4 qu1 yu4
Shang4 hai3 He2 zuo4 Zu3 zhi1
